p:
SARS-CoV encodes a chymotrypsin-like protease (3CL pro), which is also called the main protease because it plays a pivotal role in processing viral polyproteins and controlling replicase complex activity.
91 Research on drugging SARS-CoV has focused on developing small molecules such as 3CL pro inhibitors. Here, we discuss various 3CL pro inhibitors from different classes, such as terpenoids, lignoids, phlorotannins, and flavonoids.
